Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurring immediately after SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 is followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences that are not followed by any reviewer response (e.g., followed by SW-Reviewer No Response or SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 compared to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 across all variants
Percentage of variants containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that also contain SW-Reviewer Declined more than once
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in cases that undergo major revision (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision or RW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that occurs after SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 per case in the context of prolonged reviewer assignment cycles (e.g., variants with more than three SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurrences)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that is followed within 7 days by either SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in variants that include Assign a Different Editor
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'Assign a Different Editor' occurs

Name: Percentage of all SW-AE Assign Reviewers activities that are followed by Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 before any reviewer outcome (Agreed/Declined/No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in cases that ultimately result in manuscript acceptance (ending with RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences that appear more than once in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
